level.heading: Uniformity of laws.
level.text: This chapter shall be so interpreted and construed as to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law of the District of Columbia with the law of those states which enact the Uniform Common Trust Fund Act.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 3 of the Uniform Common Trust Fund Act. See Volume 7, Part II Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
